issues.title: Fix PayloadProcessorProvider to no longer use Directory for lookup, instead AtomicReader

grouping documentation is incorrect in 3.x
haversine() is broken / misdocumented

BooleanFilter changed behavior in 3.5, no longer acts as if "minimum should match" set to 1
FilterIndexReader does not override all of IndexReader methods

problems with IR's readerFinishedListener
